question: <image 1>A picture P of weight W is hung by two strings as shown. The magnitude of the tension force of each string is T. The total upward pull of the strings on the picture is:
description: The image depicts a picture labeled "P" hanging from two strings. Each string makes an angle \(\theta\) with the vertical. The tension force in each string is denoted as \(T\). The picture is suspended symmetrically, with both strings pulling upwards at equal angles.
